description: RFL_DISC_SPEC_AUTH contains discipline-specific authorization information used by Home Health.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VISIT_DISCIPLINE_C_NAME
columns.description:
A Home Health discipline category number specified on the referral.  


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DISC_SPEC_REQ_VIS
columns.description: Contains the number of requested visits for the specified discipline.

columns.name: DISC_SPEC_AUTH_VIS
columns.description: Contains the number of authorized visits for the specified discipline.

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The Effective date for this line of the auth cert info

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The End Date for this line of auth cert info
